faq.title: Frequently asked questions

faq.a2: We review qualifications, quality standards, and international patient experience.
faq.q3: Are there extra fees for me?
faq.a3: MedDiscover consultation is free for patients. Treatment fees are paid directly to the clinic.

faq.a4: We work with partner clinics across multiple countries and recommend options based on your needs.
